Texts.Eng:
The carnivorous Thelusians are well known for their tough chitin shell and exceptionally dangerous combat abilities. Able to adapt to suit any combat situation.

 Diet: Carnivore 
 
 ^orange;Perks^reset;: 
 +^green;15^reset;% Health, take ^green;-40^reset;% fall damage
 Resist: ^green;15^reset;% Physical, ^green;20^reset;% Radiation, ^green;30^reset;% Shadow
 Immune: Insanity
 Tech: ^green;Warrior Instincts^reset;
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 On ^green;hot^reset; biomes gain ^green;10^reset;% Health
 Improved ground traction
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:    
 Scythe: +^green;15^reset;% Damage, +^green;50^reset;% Knockback Resist
 Crossbow/Striker: +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance
 Shortspear/Longsword + Shield: +^green;0.5^reset;% Crit, +^green;50^reset;% Knockback Resist
 Shield: Perfect Block increases ^green;Shield Bash^reset; chance
 
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
 -^red;20^reset;% Energy, -^red;25^reset;% Charisma
 Weak: -^red;40^reset;% Poison, -^red;30^reset;% Ice
